metadata.title: CVE-2019-14459 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: nfdump 1.6.17 and earlier is affected by an integer overflow in the function Process_ipfix_template_withdraw in ipfix.c that can be abused in order to crash the process remotely (denial of service).

criterions.comment: nfdump package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.18-1').
